problem.markdown: 1. In timer element, word zero is for _______ ( ) Accumulated value ( ) Status bits (x) Preset value 2. The preset value of timer 9 , in default timer file 4, is addressed as _________ ( ) T4:9/PRE ( ) T4:9/PRE (x) T4:9.PRE ( ) T9:4/PRE 3. A timer element is made up of ___16 bit words. ( ) Four ( ) One ( ) Two (x) Three 4. In a default timer file, timer 3's done bit is addressed as ________ (x) T4:3/DN ( ) T3:4.DN ( ) T4:3.DN ( ) T3:4/DN
problem.p: 1. In timer element, word zero is for _______
2. The preset value of timer 9 , in default timer file 4, is addressed as _________
3. A timer element is made up of ___16 bit words.
4. In a default timer file, timer 3's done bit is addressed as ________
